thread.title: Who Is Alex Jones And Why Is Donald Trump Speaking To Him On The Phone?
thread.title_full: Who Is Alex Jones And Why Is Donald Trump Speaking To Him On The Phone?

author: Chris York
title: Who Is Alex Jones And Why Is Donald Trump Speaking To Him On The Phone?
text:
Who Is Alex Jones And Why Is Donald Trump Speaking To Him On The Phone? Meet Alex Jones. 22/02/2017 15:02 Chris York Senior Editor, Huffington Post UK 
Of all the disturbing stories to emerge surrounding the month-old Donald Trump administration, one of the most latest threatens to, well, trump all the others. 
Alex Jones is reportedly taking on the role of “occasional information source and validator for the President of the United States” and chat on the phone regularly. 
Who the hell is Alex Jones? Well, let’s get the basics out of the way first. Infowars Alex Jones gets emotional. Again.
